fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Whenever an Institution member dies, you collect bits to build a new player. When you get 4 bits, you gain one use of a night ability. Using it will spawn a new player at the start of the day. The player's role is Farmer (3936). You can control what this player says or does or who it targets or votes, etc. Only one of your creations can be alive at any time. If you attempt to use your ability while you don't have enough bits or a creation is already in existence, you will fail and lose all your bits.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Unique role.
- If a player rolls Creator and there is currently no Leader, turn said player into the Leader.
Goal - Kill all that would oppose you. (Wins with Institution and Neutral Benign).
Messages:
You collected bits from \_\_\_\_\_\_'s death.
You have enough bits to build a new creation. (5 bits collected)
A new player called \_\_\_\_\_\_ has been brought to the game! Say hello. (Start of day after using your ability)

fields.name: Abilities (cont.):
fields.value:
There weren't enough bits, so you lost all your progress. (Ability failed due to insufficient bits)
A creation already exists, so you lost all your progress. (Ability failed due to duplicate creation)
